body_html:
I have a very similar issue with Cuda 9.2. After creating a Conda env, my python version is 3.7, but after installing Pytorch (by running 'conda install pytorch-nightly cuda92 -c pytorch'), python --version results in 'Python 3.5.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.'.

Any idea what causes this? Thanks for the help!

I have a very similar issue with Cuda 9.2. After creating a Conda env, my python version is 3.7, but after installing Pytorch (by running 'conda install pytorch-nightly cuda92 -c pytorch'), python --version results in 'Python 3.5.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.'.
Any idea what causes this? Thanks for the help!
body:
I have a very similar issue with Cuda 9.2. After creating a Conda env, my python version is 3.7, but after installing Pytorch (by running 'conda install pytorch-nightly cuda92 -c pytorch'), python --version results in 'Python 3.5.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.'. 

Any idea what causes this? Thanks for the help!
